name: Gravity Slime (Mythitorium)
description:
Gravity Slime is a puzzle platformer made for LOWREZJAM 2022

Help the slime navigate the dungeon's 10 puzzles and reach the treasure!

* WASD to flip Gravity
* M to restart a puzzle (in case you get stuck or mess something up)
* Esc to pull up the level select menu
* Escape each room to progress to the next one

The core of gravity slime's puzzles come from the Intractable Objects

Rail blocks can be pushed along the rail they rest on when you land on them

Platforms are one way. Pass by them while going up, and safely land on them coming down

Barrels and be safely landed on from the top, but break when landed on from the sides

Toggle Blocks become solid and non-solid every time you flip gravity

Spikes are very pointy, and will spell your end if touched

These fire traps make quick work of slimes, and will spit fire if you cross their line of sight!

Landing on buttons will trigger events, helping you progress through the puzzle


Made in 14 days using Godot

Thanks to
- Lxna and freesound.org for sfx
- 04 for Font
- Saghetticord members for playtesting and feedback

Thanks, and have fun
